mapper.select: select ST_X(geom) as coordX, ST_Y(geom) as coordY from public.testlayer1
mapper.insert: insert into public.testlayer2(gid, contents, geom) select a.gid as gid, a.contents as contents, a.geom as geom from public.testlayer1 a left join public.testlayer2 b on a.gid = b.gid where b.gid is null
